resources.string: Hi Mich, this is Chang from ABC Company. Our address is 123 4th Ave, New York, NY 12345. You can call us by (987) 654-321, or shot us an email to chang@abc.com. We will have a party on Jun. 3rd and hope you can join. Additionally, my teammate Kiki will visit San Jose next Sunday and her flight number is FL 345. It would also be great if you can meet her there. For more questions, please visit google.com.
